sentences.sContent: Her academic credentials include an MA and a PhD.
sentences.sCn: 她的学历是文学硕士和哲学博士。

synos.tran: [管理]证书；文凭；信任状（credential的复数）

phrases.pCn: 资格审查委员会；证件审核委员会

remMethod.val: cred(相信)+entials→使人信服的文件→证明书

trans.tranOther: someone’s education, achievements, experience etc that prove they have the ability to do something
